name: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
achievementgroup: Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song

stage1.title: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
stage1.description: Complete 5 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).

stage2.title: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
stage2.description: Complete 10 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).

stage3.title: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
stage3.description: Complete 15 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).
